dashboard.title: Command Center
dashboard.subtitle: Monitor and manage all your agents from a single view.

canvas.title: Live Canvas
canvas.subtitle: Real-time streaming workspace managed by each employee agent autonomously.
canvas.heading: Streaming AI Canvas
canvas.description: This page is a live, streaming workspace where each employee agent owns a section and can push rich HTML widgets — status panels, charts, progress bars, and interactive controls.
canvas.featureAgentDesc: Each employee manages its own area with full HTML/CSS/JS freedom.
canvas.featureSandboxDesc: Content renders in iframe sandbox for isolation and security.
canvas.featureRealtimeDesc: Canvas updates arrive via SSE, no page refresh needed.
canvas.emptySlots: No running employee agents. Only employee-archetype agents can push canvas content.

agents.title: Agents
agents.subtitle: View and manage all registered agent instances.
agents.noMatch: No agents match the current filter.
agents.createHint: Create an agent with actant agent create

agentDetail.notFound: Agent "{{name}}" not found. It may have been destroyed.
agentDetail.selectSession: Select a session to view its conversation.

chat.readyHint: This agent is running and ready to chat.
chat.stoppedHint: Agent is stopped — start it from the detail page to begin chatting.
chat.inputDisabled: Agent is not running — start it to chat
chat.sendHint: Enter to send · Shift+Enter for new line
chat.notRunning: Agent "{{name}}" is not running. Please start it first before chatting.

activity.title: Activity
activity.subtitle: Agent activity feed — prompts, sessions, and interactions.

events.title: Events
events.subtitle: Real-time event stream from the Actant EventBus.
events.empty: No events match the current filter.

settings.title: Settings
settings.subtitle: Daemon information and dashboard configuration.
settings.connectionDesc: Current connection to the Actant daemon process.
settings.agentOverviewDesc: Summary of all registered agents by status.
settings.aboutDesc: Actant Dashboard — real-time monitoring for AI agent orchestration.
settings.aboutTauri: Tauri-ready architecture — swap to TauriTransport for native desktop.
